mapper.insert: insert into inquire_tb(inquire_title, inquire_content, created_at, user_id, inquire_category_id) values (#{inquireTitle}, #{inquireContent}, now(), #{userId}, #{inquireCategoryId});
mapper.update: update inquire_tb set inquire_category_id = #{inquireCategoryId}, inquire_title = #{inquireTitle}, inquire_content = #{inquireContent}, created_at = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from inquire_tb i join inquire_category_tb ic on i.inquire_category_id = ic.id order by i.id desc;
